title: 关于authme链接mariadb数据库问题
author: XL_xiaoling
txt_content:
因为本人用的是Linux系统，输入获取mysql安装包，自动安装了mariadb，百度后说这个和mysql没区别，所以我设置authme的config如下  mySQLColumnName: username
  mySQLTablename: authme
  mySQLUsername: root
  backend: mysql
  mySQLColumnLastLogin: lastlogin
  mySQLDatabase: mariadb
  mySQLPort: '3306'
  mySQLColumnIp: ip
  mySQLHost: 127.0.0.1
  mySQLColumnPassword: password
  mySQLPassword: 123456
  caching: false
  mySQLlastlocX: x
  mySQLlastlocY: y
  mySQLlastlocZ: z
  mySQLColumnEmail: email
  mySQLColumnId: id
  mySQLlastlocWorld: world
  mySQLColumnLogged: isLogged

但运行时服务端提示
[AuthMe] Enabling AuthMe v3.4
[18:44:36 INFO]: [AuthMe] Loading Configuration File...
[18:44:36 INFO]: [AuthMe] Set Default Language: En 
[18:44:36 INFO]: [AuthMe] Vault plugin detected, hook with GroupManager system
[18:44:36 INFO]: [AuthMe] Hook with Essentials plugin
[18:44:36 INFO]: [AuthMe] Hook with EssentialsSpawn plugin
[18:44:36 INFO]: [AuthMe] MySQL driver loaded
[18:44:36 INFO]: [AuthMe] Connection pool ready
[18:45:37 INFO]: [AuthMe] ConnectionPool was unavailable... Reconnected!
>

请大神帮忙解答

replies.author: Phantom06
replies.txt_content: 插件无法连接数据库，检查填写
